title: KnownLicenseEntity
description: JSON schema for entities based on KnownLicense runtime schema

code.description: Short, commonly recognized code of the licence (ie. CC_BY_SA)

name.description: Full, descriptive name of the license (ie. Creative Commons - Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs)

description.description: Short description of the license conditions

url.description: An url pointing to full license content
